sentences.sCn: 他们昨天参观了天文台。

sentences.sContent: When a piece of antimatter strikes the observatory and collides with "normal" matter, both particles immediately annihilate and are transformed into gamma rays — which Fermi can detect.
sentences.sContent_eng: When a piece of antimatter strikes the observatory and collides with "normal" matter, both particles immediately annihilate and are transformed into gamma rays — which Fermi can detect.
sentences.sCn: 当一小块反物质击打天文台并与“正常”的物质相碰撞时，两个粒子都立即湮灭，并转变为伽马射线- 费米就可以检测到它。

synos.tran: 天文台；[气象][天]气象台；瞭望台

remMethod.val: observ(e)(观察) + at + ory(表地点， 名词后缀) → 天文台， 天文观测站

trans.tranCn: 天文台， 天文观测站
trans.tranOther: a special building from which scientists watch the moon, stars, weather etc
